BR_text.BRsummary: getting the wrong person id in the callback
BR_text.BRdescription:
Hello,
 Any idea what is causing this, AFAIK it's from server.py sending the -1 index instead of 0, in the meantime, the rendered picture is correct, while the detected faces IDs shown in the #peopleInVideo are wrong.
 <denchmark-link:https://camo.githubusercontent.com/01f025cc7612d27e3c0e21d04d92b298ab76cd1280f9dd054a94f5fba49e54d1/687474703a2f2f6937302e696d6775702e6e65742f53637265656e73686f74656563652e706e67></denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
I think this is being caused by faulty logic in server.py, starting at line 302: 
 
 
 openface/demos/web/server.py
 
 
          Line 302
       in
       5ca2354
 
 
 
 
 
 
  identity = self.svm.predict(rep)[0] if self.svm else -1

comments_1.comment_text: I'll fix this over the weekend
